content: Thanks for the discussion Guys! We will use Device here, probably with some extensions, but it will fit well!
Rodrigo Sendin has marked this topic as resolved.
My late recommendation is to use Device because we have no Product resource and Device is the closest we have .

Device is the correct resource. All of the listed items are definitely Devices. The only question is whether to use Device or DeviceDefinition - which is driven by whether you have actual instances or are just talking about kinds of things.
